short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use converter that allows you to upload your media, name it, then retrieve it in an mp3 or mp4 format in the chosen quality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to upload a file and have it converted to a .mp3 or .mp4 format. The extension also allows you to give the newly converted file a new name as well. Users should install this extension to easily convert their favorite media into the widely compatible formats of .mp3 and .mp4.
